Administration.text:
Type: Synthetic
opioid
(ultra short acting)
Routes of Administration: IV
Common Trade Names: ULTIVA

Adult_Dosing.text:
1mcg/kg bolus for acute pain
.25-5 mcg/kg/hr (titrate q20min) for maintenance analgesia

Pediatric_Dosing.text:
1mcg/kg bolus for acute pain
.25-5 mcg/kg/hr (titrate q20min) for maintenance analgesia

Pregnancy_Rating.text: Prolonged use of opioid analgesics during pregnancy may cause neonatal opioid withdrawal syndrome
